headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 We Brush Off
summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.

raw.headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 We Brush Off
raw.summary: Generating cash is essential for any business, but not all cash-rich companies are great investments. Some produce plenty of cash but fail to allocate it effectively, leading to missed opportunities.

headline: Intuit (INTU) Revolutionizes Small Business Finance With Advanced AI Accounting Tools
summary: Intuit (INTU) recently launched its AI accounting tools for QuickBooks, introducing task-focused AI agents designed to enhance financial operations’ speed and accuracy. This pivotal product update aligns with the hyperautomation trend, as emphasized by Better Business Advice, potentially bolstering market confidence. Intuit's strategic partnerships and financial guidance improvements may have added weight to its 16% price increase last quarter, a period marked by broader gains across major...

headline: Best AI Marketing Tools (2025): QuickBooks to Launch Campaign Automation via Mailchimp, Named Top Marketing Solution by Better Business Advice
summary: Better Business Advice has recognized QuickBooks as a top AI marketing tool in 2025, identifying the upcoming Mailchimp-powered marketing agent as a significant advancement for small and mid-sized businesses looking to scale personalized marketing without additional headcount.
